statements: SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT name, affiliation FROM Researchers WHERE research_experience > 5;
SELECT researcher_id, name FROM Researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University XYZ';
SELECT name, research_experience FROM Researchers WHERE research_experience < 3 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE affiliation LIKE '%Institute%' ORDER BY research_experience DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, name, affiliation FROM Researchers WHERE research_experience > 5;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE name LIKE '%John%' AND affiliation = 'University XYZ';
SELECT name, research_experience FROM Researchers ORDER BY research_experience DESC;
SELECT AVG(research_experience) AS average_experience FROM Researchers;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE affiliation IN ('Company A', 'University B') ORDER BY name ASC, research_experience DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM researchers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE data_type = 'Experiment';
SELECT researcher_id, first_name FROM researchers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT data_id, data FROM research_data ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM researchers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT researcher_id, COUNT(*) AS num_of_data FROM research_data GROUP BY researcher_id;
SELECT data_type, COUNT(*) AS num_of_records FROM research_data GROUP BY data_type ORDER BY num_of_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers r JOIN research_data rd ON r.researcher_id = rd.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT name, department FROM Researchers;
SELECT id, name, research_interests FROM Researchers ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT id, name, department FROM Researchers WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
SELECT id, query_text, date_created FROM Queries ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers
SELECT name, department FROM Researchers ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM QualitativeData WHERE researcher_id = 1
SELECT * FROM QualitativeData WHERE data_source LIKE '%interview%'
SELECT researcher_id, query_text, date_created FROM Queries ORDER BY date_created
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_project FROM Researchers;
SELECT data_id, research_topic, data_text FROM Research_Data WHERE research_topic = 'Machine Learning';
SELECT researcher_name, query_text FROM Researchers JOIN Queries ON Researchers.researcher_id = Queries.researcher_id;
SELECT query_text, result_data FROM Queries JOIN Results ON Queries.query_id = Results.query_id;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_project FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT research_project FROM Researchers ORDER BY research_project DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_project FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'Dr%' AND research_project ILIKE '%data%' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC, research_project DESC;
SELECT rd.research_topic, r.result_data FROM Research_Data rd JOIN Results r ON rd.data_id = r.result_id;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM Researchers ORDER BY institution DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ResearchProjects WHERE project_id > 3;
SELECT data_description, data_type FROM ResearchData WHERE data_type = 'Experimental';
SELECT analysis_id, result FROM DataAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_id ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM Researchers WHERE expertise = 'Biology';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ResearchProjects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT data_description, data_type FROM ResearchData WHERE data_type = 'Genomics' ORDER BY data_description DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, institution, project_name FROM Researchers JOIN ResearchProjects ON Researchers.researcher_id = ResearchProjects.researcher_id;
SELECT query_text, query_date FROM QueryLogs WHERE researcher_id = 101 ORDER BY query_date DESC;
